actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: Encouraging the continuation and further expansion of sister-city relationships between United States and Haitian municipalities as an essential instrument in the ongoing efforts to rebuild Haiti and restore hope and prosperity to its people.

summary.text: Encourages the continuation and expansion of sister-city relationships between U.S. and Haitian municipalities as an essential instrument in rebuilding Haiti and restoring hope and prosperity to its people.

titles.title: Encouraging the continuation and further expansion of sister-city relationships between United States and Haitian municipalities as an essential instrument in the ongoing efforts to rebuild Haiti and restore hope and prosperity to its people.
